title: 81/320/EEC: Commission Decision of 29 April 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as 'ORTEC- economical energy dispersive spectrometer, model EEDS II, with Si (Li) X-ray detector, model 7880-S-449' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 29 April 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as "ORTEC - economical energy dispersive spectrometer, model EEDS II, with Si (Li) X-ray detector, model 7880- S-449" may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties (81/320/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "ORTEC - economical energy dispersive spectrometer, model EEDS II, with Si (Li) X-ray detector, model 7880-S-449", which is the subject of an application by the Government of the Federal Republic of Germany of 27 October 1980, may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 April 1981.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 184, 15.7.1975, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 134, 31.5.1979, p. 1. (3) OJ No L 318, 13.12.1979, p. 32.
